description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nWhy Won't You Die?:
After this creature causes 0 damage with an attack or spell, it gains 12% {STAT_attack} and {STAT_intelligence}. This trait does not work on damage that is completely prevented by other effects. This trait can activate a maximum of 1 time per turn.
name: Sharpened Knife
